duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparing, manipulating, and staging data from various sources and loading them into Power BI environments.
Creating dashboards and providing consistent Power BI reports.
Translating business needs to technical specifications and collaborating with stakeholders.
Acting as a primary analyst and translating business needs into clearly defined requirements and functional designs.
Developing sound methods to transform data from various sources into viable formats for ingestion into Power BI environments.
Designing, building, publishing, and scheduling Power BI reporting solutions.
Maintaining and supporting data analytics platforms and creating tools to store data.
Creating visualizations and reports for requested projects and updating technical documentation.
Providing monthly administrative reporting on project duration and technical support for specific Power BI needs.
Following quality assurance and control processes, and performing routine data management tasks.
Working as a member of a team or independently with minimal supervision.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering, Information Technology, or related degree. (Master's preferred)
